title: Unhallowed Shadows
description:
Title: Unhallowed Shadows
Author: Stefanos Kottas
Publisher: Stefanos Kottas
Smashwords Edition
Language: English
Format: Pdf/Epub

Description
The knights had raised her believing that in her life she would need only silver, swords and unquestioning dedication to God. Erica never questioned this creed, until she saw their bodies strewn around her feet.
Marcos, when he began his career as a policeman, could not have imagined that one day he would find himself in a world of vampires and demons, lurking in the neighborhoods and alleys of his city.
Cursed and trapped in a fate not of their choosing, Erica and Marcos will be forced to fight for their lives tooth and nail, against a threat they cannot see, though they can sense it; a threat lurking in the darkness: a Creature capable of sowing dread in other monsters. Will they manage to rise to the challenge, without losing their humanity? 

A gripping adventure, teeming with vampires, demons and otherworldly creatures. The protagonists, a young vampire and a hardened policeman, must fight for their lives against a threat casting its dark shadow over them, invisibly and terrifying
